title: String Concatenation
description: Write a Python function that concatenates two strings and returns the result.
test:
def passTest():
	solution = Solution()
	param = [['Hello', 'World'], ['I love ', 'candy'], ['abc', 'def'], ['jere', 'my'], ['I feel', ' very happy']]
	ans = ['HelloWorld', 'I love candy', 'abcdef', 'jeremy', 'I feel very happy']
	for i in range(5):
		if ans[i] == solution.stringConcatenation(param[i][0], param[i][1]):
			continue
		else
			return False
	return True
passedTest = 'Passed all test cases' if passTest() else 'Test cases failed'
print(passedTest)
